summary: The client asked Sarah to set a vision meeting and the PM asked for a project name; QA, Architect, and Developer did not provide input. No decisions or sign-offs were made during this exchange.

actions.task: Schedule a vision meeting as requested by the client and invite PM, QA, Architect, and Developer; include agenda and request proposed project names and pre-meeting input

risks.risk: Key stakeholders (QA, Architect, Developer) have not provided input, risking misalignment and delays in defining scope and naming the project.
risks.mitigation: Ensure the vision meeting invites all stakeholders, request pre-meeting input (including project name suggestions) from PM and technical leads, and set clear decisions and deadlines during the meeting.
